order_id.description: Unique identifier for each order transaction

customer_id.description: Foreign key reference to customer who placed the order

product_id.description: Foreign key reference to the product being ordered

order_date.description: Date and time when the order was placed by customer

order_amount.description: Total monetary value of the order in USD

order_status.description: Current status of the order in fulfillment process

created_at.description: System timestamp when record was inserted into database

customer_id.description: Unique identifier for each customer account

email.description: Primary email address for customer communications

signup_date.description: Date when customer first created their account

customer_status.description: Current status of customer account (A=Active, I=Inactive)

product_id.description: Unique identifier for each product in catalog

price.description: Current selling price of the product

created_date.description: Date when product was added to catalog

is_active.description: Whether product is currently available for sale
